name: Ultimate Humungousaur
abilities: Gigantic growth, super strength, bio-bone projectiles, armored shell
description: An evolved Humungousaur with a more aggressive appearance, even greater strength, and the ability to launch missile-like projectiles from his hands.

name: Ultimate Swampfire
abilities: Plant/fire hybrid, regeneration, explosive fire bombs, tree-like structure
description: An evolved Swampfire capable of launching larger and more powerful fireballs, absorbing plant life, and regenerating more quickly.

name: Ultimate Big Chill
abilities: Plasma-ice flame, flight, intangibility, freezing powers
description: An evolved Big Chill with an aggressive appearance, capable of producing more powerful ice blasts and freezing opponents instantly.

name: Ultimate Spidermonkey
abilities: Enhanced agility, webbing, more arms, strength boost
description: An evolved Spidermonkey with multiple limbs and a longer tail. He can shoot thicker and stronger webbing, and generate sticky, web-like balls.

name: Ultimate Cannonbolt
abilities: Ultimate spin form, reinforced shell, stronger impact, better defense
description: An evolved Cannonbolt with a spikier, more durable shell. He can roll into a spiked ball to deliver powerful spiked attacks.

name: Ultimate Way Big
abilities: Gigantic size (much larger), cosmic energy blasts, super strength
description: An evolved Way Big who is gigantic in size and even more powerful, capable of flying through space and firing cosmic energy beams.

name: Water Hazard
abilities: Acidic water manipulation, fluidity
description: A red, aquatic Orishan alien who can shoot highly pressurized streams of water and absorb water from his surroundings.

name: AmpFibian
abilities: Electrokinesis, amphibious ability, adaptability to watery / toxic environments
description: A jellyfish-like Amperi who can fly, manipulate electricity, read minds, and turn intangible to pass through electrical currents.

name: Armodrillo
abilities: Earth / seismic manipulation, drill limbs, strength
description: A strong, armored Talpaedan who can generate powerful earthquakes and create fissures using his jackhammer-like arms.

name: Terraspin
abilities: Wind control, spinning shell, flight by spinning, strength
description: A green, turtle-like Geochelone Aerio alien with a propeller-like underside. He can spin his shell to create powerful wind attacks.

name: NRG
abilities: Radiation, energy blasts, thermokinesis, toxic effects
description: A radioactive, energy-based Prypiatosian-B alien encased in a heavy containment suit. He can shoot powerful radioactive beams and absorb energy.

name: Fasttrack
abilities: Extreme speed, reflexes, fast acceleration
description: A feline-like alien with superhuman speed, enhanced reflexes, and strength, but is less agile and has a harder time stopping than XLR8.

name: Clockwork
abilities: Time manipulation, pausing/moving time segments, rewinding small frames
description: A time-manipulating Chronosapien, this robotic alien can fire time rays to age, reverse, or freeze objects and people, but is slow and vulnerable to electromagnetic pulses.

name: Chamalien
abilities: Invisibility, camouflage, agility, energy tail whip
description: A small, gecko-like alien with the ability to become perfectly invisible and blend into any environment to evade enemies.

name: Eatle
abilities: Energy absorption, plasma blasts from horn, durable shell
description: A large, rhinoceros beetle-like alien with a powerful jaw and horn. He can eat and consume most materials and then convert them into a powerful energy beam fired from his horn.

name: Jury Rigg
abilities: Super speed, mechanical repair and sabotage, hyperactivity
description: A small, impish Gremlin-like alien with a destructive talent for improvisational mechanical manipulation, capable of building and repairing technology from scrap.

name: Shocksquatch
abilities: Electrokinesis, enhanced strength, speed, and durability
description: A yeti-like alien who can generate and manipulate electricity from his body, creating powerful electrical charges and shockwaves.

name: Ultimate Wildmutt
abilities: Sight restored, enhanced senses, larger body, acidic saliva
description: An evolved Wildmutt with a larger and more ferocious appearance, possessing enhanced strength, speed, and agility.

name: Ultimate Greymatter
abilities: Enhanced intelligence, energy manipulation, teleportation
description: An evolved Grey Matter who is even more intelligent, capable of solving the most complex problems and developing highly intricate plans.

name: Ultimate Arctiguana
abilities: Frost breath with spikes, faster ice generation, can fly using ice jets
description: A cold-blooded, bipedal iguana-like alien that can breathe a freezing vapor or fire a long-range freeze ray from his mouth to encase his targets in ice.

name: Ultimate Rath
abilities: Larger build, stronger claws, armored skin, energy roar
description: An evolved Rath with a more primal and aggressive appearance, possessing even greater strength and destructive capabilities.
